Our full statement on the rocket attacks against Israel with @RepEliotEngel, @NitaLowey, @RepTedDeutch, and @RepJoshG: https://schneider.house.gov/media/press-releases/schneider-engel-lowey-deutch-gottheimer-statement-rocket-attacks-israel¬†‚Ä¶

In response to the continued, indefensible attacks by Hamas, Palestinian Islamic Jihad and other terror groups, Israel has a right and responsibility to defend itself and its citizens from further violence. Israel must be able to protect its people as it pursues a ceasefire.

I strongly condemn the outrageous, indiscriminate rocket attacks from terror groups in Gaza into Israel, which have claimed the lives of four Israelis, wounded many more, and put at risk hundreds of thousands of others.
I am watching with concern the events in Israel. Thankfully the Iron Dome defense system helped protect community by intercepting dozens of the rockets fired from Gaza.
